thread.title: The Release Date for 'Stranger Things' Season 2 Has Finally Been Revealed
thread.title_full: The Release Date for 'Stranger Things' Season 2 Has Finally Been Revealed | Complex

author: khal
title: The Release Date for 'Stranger Things' Season 2 Has Finally Been Revealed
text:
The Release Date for 'Stranger Things' Season 2 Has Finally Been Revealed 06, 2017 Share Tweet 0 Subscribe to Complex Video via Netflix On Friday, the whole world was shook off of word that a teaser for season two of Stranger Things hitting, especially when people thought they'd found the official release date . It looks like simple math didn't mean an easy release date reveal, as Netflix announced that Stranger Things ' second season would hit the service this Halloween 2017.
The teaser above appears to have everything: a shot of Eleven , the Hawkins Laboratory, an epic-looking monster drawing, and much, much more. There's a lot to unpack, and a lot of mystery, but at least we know when we'll make our return to Hawkins.
Ghostbusters squad.
Hawkins Laboratory back?
Uh oh...
Sh*t is about to get REAL!
Related Did Netflix Just Reveal the 'Stranger Things' Season 2 Release Date? Five Questions 'Stranger Things' Season Two Needs to Answer Sleep Easy: Millie Bobby Brown to Officially Return for More Eggo Waffles in 'Stranger Things' Season 2 For those who are keeping score, season two of Stranger Things picks up about a year after the events of season one. Will's still feeling the effects of the Upside Down, Hopper's made a deal with the man, and Eleven isn't gone gone. From the looks of this (too short!) teaser, things will be just as intense—and amazing—this season. Halloween is a long time away, but that just means we have that much more time for cryptic Netflix promo and (hopefully!) some more teasers and info about the upcoming season on the way.
Watch Now Tags: News , Videos , Netflix , Stranger Things , Super Bowl LI
